Package org.sat4j.sat

Class RemoteControlStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.sat.RemoteControlStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.sat4j.minisat.core.ConflictTimer, org.sat4j.minisat.core.IPhaseSelectionStrategy, org.sat4j.minisat.core.RestartStrategy
    public class RemoteControlStrategy
extends Object
implements org.sat4j.minisat.core.RestartStrategy, org.sat4j.minisat.core.IPhaseSelectionStrategy
    Strategy used by the solver when launched with the remote control.
    Author:
    sroussel
